nodes.commentary: Kick off blows, and this is the 4th time both team have met this season
first corner taken by  the attacking side
Unnecessary challenge, perhaps VAR will be looking into this one
It is cheap goal for the home side. Smart finish. Keeper was left standing.
Excellent save by the shot-stopper. Not the last save he will make today.
Corner for the visitors. In swinger and they are all lining up for this one.
Great goal - !2 this season . Excellent finish
Professional foul. He gets a warning
2nd corner for the visitors. Its time they took advantage.
Well they are still in it
Captain seems determined attacking against the wind.
Another warning for him. Ref is making sure this game stays even
The high line is working for the home side
Third corner and still no advantage from any set piece
Another professional foul. He is shoring up the midfield thats for sure
Exceptional team effort to set up the midfielder, and excellent finish after 28 passes, goes to shoe haw far this team has come
He must be off for that! VAR keeps him on
Another corner, the Wind is not helping him
First yellow card. The ref's patience has run out, professional fouls are not the answer.
His manager has taken him off , its not safe as he is on a yellow.
Talal blows the whistle to end a good game full of promise for the young visitors.
